com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers

Class ValueController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
      • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.LabeledFieldController
        • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.controllers.ValueController

  • public class ValueController
extends LabeledFieldController
    Represents a field that displays a value.

    For the field value, the associated FormModel can return a string or any object. The value's toString method will be used to display the value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ValueController(android.content.Context ctx, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String labelText)
      Constructs a new instance of a value field.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ValueController

        public ValueController(android.content.Context ctx,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String labelText)
        Constructs a new instance of a value field.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the Android context
        name - the name of the field
        labelText - the label to display beside the field. Set to null to not show a label.
